taskbody.context: You can set default preferences for new diagrams. These preferences apply only to all newly created diagrams and remain until changed.

step.cmd: On the menu bar, click Windows Preferences .

stepresult.p: The Preferences dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd: Double-click Design Studio in the navigation tree.
Do one or more of the following:

choices.choice: To change the pageflow configuration or global settings (for example, popup bars, animated layout, animated zoom) of the diagram, complete the fields and radio buttons located to the right of the hierarchical tree.
To change the color and fonts of states, select Appearance in the hierarchical tree.
To change the appearance of ruler and grid options, select Rulers and Grid in the hierarchical tree.
To change the appearance of transitions, select Connections in the hierarchical tree.
To change the printing preference, select Printing in the hierarchical tree.
The Pathmaps feature is not supported at this time.

step.cmd: After the changes are made, click Apply.
Click OK to confirm the changes.
